languages.text: {n}Трапеза проходит в молчании — скорее комфортном, нежели неловком. Наконец, вновь наполнив бокалы, Хейнрикс откидывается в кресле и смотрит на вас — спокойным, расслабленным взглядом.{/n} "В твоей компании время течет незаметно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Трапеза проходит в молчании — скорее комфортном, нежели неловком. Наконец, вновь наполнив бокалы, Хейнрикс откидывается в кресле и смотрит на вас — спокойным, расслабленным взглядом.{/n} "В твоей компании время течет незаметно. Даже странно — я уже привык урывками проводить с тобой время только между бедами и непредвиденными проблемами".

languages.text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."
languages.original_text: {n}Трапеза проходит в молчании — скорее комфортном, нежели неловком. Наконец, вновь наполнив бокалы, Хейнрикс откидывается в кресле и смотрит на вас — спокойным, расслабленным взглядом.{/n} "В твоей компании время течет незаметно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

{n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

{n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

{n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

languages.text: {n}这顿晚餐在沉默中度过了。尽管你们两人一言不发，但这样的沉默并不令人尴尬，反而令你感到舒适。到最后，海因里希再次为你的杯子里添满了饮料，坐回了椅子上，看着你。他的目光平静而放松。{/n}“和你在一起，时间总是不知不觉就溜走了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

traits.locale_text: {n}这顿晚餐在沉默中度过了。尽管你们两人一言不发，但这样的沉默并不令人尴尬，反而令你感到舒适。到最后，海因里希再次为你的杯子里添满了饮料，坐回了椅子上，看着你。他的目光平静而放松。{/n}“和你在一起，时间总是不知不觉就溜走了。”

languages.text: {n}La comida pasa en un silencio más cómodo que extraño. Por fin, tras volver a llenar vuestras copas, Heinrix se echa atrás en la silla y te mira con ojos tranquilos.{/n} «El tiempo pasa volando cuando estamos juntos».
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

traits.locale_text: {n}La comida pasa en un silencio más cómodo que extraño. Por fin, tras volver a llenar vuestras copas, Heinrix se echa atrás en la silla y te mira con ojos tranquilos.{/n} «El tiempo pasa volando cuando estamos juntos».

languages.text: {n}食事は気まずいというよりは、心地よい沈黙のうちに過ぎていく。最後にもう一度グラスにワインを注いだ後、ハインリックスは椅子に腰を下ろし、あなたを見つめた。その視線は穏やかで、リラックスしていた。{/n}「あなたと一緒にいると、時間があっという間に過ぎていく」
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

traits.locale_text: {n}食事は気まずいというよりは、心地よい沈黙のうちに過ぎていく。最後にもう一度グラスにワインを注いだ後、ハインリックスは椅子に腰を下ろし、あなたを見つめた。その視線は穏やかで、リラックスしていた。{/n}「あなたと一緒にいると、時間があっという間に過ぎていく」

languages.text: {n}Le repas se déroule dans un silence confortable, sans que la moindre gêne s'installe entre vous. Enfin, après avoir de nouveau rempli vos verres, Heinrix se laisse aller dans sa chaise et vous observe, l'air parfaitement calme et détendu.{/n} « En votre compagnie, le temps passe sans même que l'on s'en rende compte. »
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le repas se déroule dans un silence confortable, sans que la moindre gêne s'installe entre vous. Enfin, après avoir de nouveau rempli vos verres, Heinrix se laisse aller dans sa chaise et vous observe, l'air parfaitement calme et détendu.{/n} « En votre compagnie, le temps passe sans même que l'on s'en rende compte. »

languages.text: {n}Die Mahlzeit vergeht in Stille, die eher angenehm als peinlich wirkt. Nachdem Heinrix eure Gläser wieder aufgefüllt hat, sinkt er in seinen Stuhl und schaut dich an – sein Blick ist ruhig und entspannt.{/n} "Mit Eurer Anwesenheit vergeht die Zeit wie im Flug."
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mahlzeit vergeht in Stille, die eher angenehm als peinlich wirkt. Nachdem Heinrix eure Gläser wieder aufgefüllt hat, sinkt er in seinen Stuhl und schaut dich an – sein Blick ist ruhig und entspannt.{/n} "Mit Eurer Anwesenheit vergeht die Zeit wie im Flug."

languages.text: {n}Yemek, tuhaf olmaktan ziyade huzurlu bir sessizlik içinde geçiyor. Kadehlerinizi bir kez daha doldurmanızın ardından Heinrix, en nihayetinde sandalyesine yaslanarak sana bakıyor. Bakışlarına sakinlik ve rahatlık hâkim.{/n} "Yanındayken zamanın geçtiği hiç fark edilmiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The meal passes in a silence that is more comfortable than awkward. At last, after topping up your glasses once more, Heinrix falls back in his chair and looks at you — his gaze is calm, relaxed.{/n} "Time slips by imperceptibly in your company."
